subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The first pitch to Adam Greenberg in his major league career, in 2005, hit him below his ear. Miami has signed him to a one-day contract and he is expected to bat next week against the Mets.
snippet: The first pitch to Adam Greenberg in his major league career, in 2005, hit him below his ear. Miami has signed him to a one-day contract and he is expected to bat next week against the Mets.
